Package ml.alternet.parser

Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventsHandler
    Events receiver when a grammar is parsing an input.
    Grammar
    Base interface for defining grammars.
    Handler
    Events receiver when a grammar is parsing an input with rewind capabilities (mark, consume/cancel).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventsHandler.NumberValue
    A number as the token value.
    EventsHandler.RuleEnd
    Event fired when a rule ends ; indicates whether the rule was fulfilled or not.
    EventsHandler.RuleEvent<R extends Grammar.Rule>
    When a rule or token is matched while parsing.
    EventsHandler.RuleStart
    Event fired when a rule starts.
    EventsHandler.StringValue
    A string as the token value.
    EventsHandler.TokenValue<T>
    A wrapper of a parsed value, the token that creates it, and the position where the value was found when available.
    Grammar.CharToken
    A character token, based on compositions of character ranges.
    Grammar.Choice
    A choice rule ; when parsing, the first rule that is fulfilled is selected.
    Grammar.Combine
    A rule skeleton for combining rules.
    Grammar.EnumToken<T>
    A token made from an enum class or a list of string values.
    Grammar.EnumValueToken
    An enum value token.
    Grammar.Except
    An exclusion rule.
    Grammar.GrammarToken
    A token based on a grammar.
    Grammar.Number
    A number token.
    Grammar.OneOrMore
    Make a rule repeatable.
    Grammar.Optional
    Make a rule optional.
    Grammar.Proxy
    Allow to separate a rule declaration and its assignment.
    Grammar.Proxy.Deferred
    A proxy defined by an initializer.
    Grammar.Proxy.Named
    A proxy defined by its name.
    Grammar.Rule
    A grammar is composed of rules that can be tokens or so-called rules.
    Grammar.Sequence
    A sequence rule.
    Grammar.Skip
    A token not transmitted to the event handler while parsing.
    Grammar.StringToken
    A string token.
    Grammar.Token
    When parsing, a token yield a EventsHandler.TokenValue.
    Grammar.TypedToken<T>
    A token based on rules.
    Grammar.Wrapper
    A rule skeleton for composing rules.
    Grammar.ZeroOrMore
    Make a rule optional repeatable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Grammar.Match
    Hold the parsing status.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Grammar.Fragment
    Mark a token of a grammar that it is a fragment of a rule token, or a rule that is a fragment of a nested rule.
    Grammar.MainRule
    Mark the main rule of a grammar with this annotation.
    Grammar.Replace
    Replace a rule/token field when extending a grammar.
    Grammar.WhitespacePolicy
    Indicates how to process whitespaces during parsing.

Package ml.alternet.parser Description

Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.
See Also:
Parsing Expression Grammar (1), Parsing Expression Grammar (2)
